Tome12.Name: TOME 12 - DISCORDANCE
Tome12.Description:
UNLOCK THE RIFT PASS TO INSTANTLY RECEIVE THE BELOW ITEMS!

  • The Blight's Phosphoric Pores, Very Rare
  • Jonah Vasquez's Tech Fatigues, Very Rare
  • Killer Corn Husk Charm, Rare

    • THE RIFT PASS ALSO GRANTS ACCESS TO PREMIUM REWARDS UNLOCKED OVER THE COURSE OF 70 TIERS, INCLUDING:

  • The Blight's Invasive Species Outfit, Very Rare
  • Jonah Vasquez's Infiltration Gear Outfit, Very Rare
  • Mikaela Reid's Hecate's Offering Outfit, Very Rare
  • Claudette Morel's Science Girl Outfit, Rare
  • The Nurse's The Accident Outfit, Rare
  • PLUS: 4 more Very Rare Outfits, & 1 more Rare Outfit
  • Terror Carousel Charm, Ultra Rare
  • Jonah Vasquez Figurine Charm, Very Rare
  • Blighted Crow Charm, Very Rare
  • Gnaw-rly Waves Charm, Rare
  • Poisonous Foxglove Charm, Rare
  • PLUS: 12 more Charms
  • 1000 _GFX::HCIcon
  • And even more rewards!

node_T12L1_02.Name: Liberator
node_T12L1_02.Description: Unhook 4 Survivor(s). Must unhook them safely.

node_T12L1_04.Name: Life Giver
node_T12L1_04.Description: Heal a total of 3 health state(s) of any Survivor.

node_T12L1_05.Name: Strategic Alliance
node_T12L1_05.Description: Perform a cooperative action for 90 second(s).

node_T12L1_12.Name: Lethal Strike
node_T12L1_12.Description: Hit 6 Survivor(s) while performing a Lethal Rush as The Blight.
node_T12L1_12.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L1_13.Name: Dragon's Hit
node_T12L1_13.Description: Hit a Survivor suffering from the Exposed status effect with your weapon 2 time(s) while using the perk Dragonâ€™s Grip.
node_T12L1_13.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L1_14.Name: A Bit More in the Tank
node_T12L1_14.Description: Escape 2 chase(s) while using the perk Overcome.
node_T12L1_14.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L1_15.Name: Keep Your Enemies Closer
node_T12L1_15.Description: Hide within 10 meters of the Killer without being caught for a total of 15 seconds.
node_T12L1_15.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L1_17.Name: Predator or Prey
node_T12L1_17.Description:
Earn a total of 3 of the following of Bronze Quality or better as Survivor or Killer:
  • Evader emblem(s).
  • Chaser emblem(s).

node_T12L1_18.Name: Jump-start
node_T12L1_18.Description: Vault a pallet or window while in a chase 2 time(s).
node_T12L1_18.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L1_19.Name: Strength in Numbers
node_T12L1_19.Description: Survive while 1 other Survivor(s) escape the trial as Jonah Vasquez. You must remain in the trial while they escape.
node_T12L1_19.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L1_20.Name: Dark Adherent
node_T12L1_20.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L1_21.Name: Another For the Entity
node_T12L1_21.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L1_End01.Name: Epilogue
node_T12L1_End01.Description: Complete the level and collect your rewards.

node_T12L1_Glyph01.Name: Glyph Communer
node_T12L1_Glyph01.Description: Commune with 2 Blue Glyph(s).
node_T12L1_Glyph01.RulesDescription: • Selecting this challenge generates a Blue Glyph that afflicts you with either the Blindness or Oblivious status effect.

node_T12L1_Glyph02.Name: Glyph Massacre
node_T12L1_Glyph02.Description: Commune with the Orange Glyph and then Hook 6 Survivors.
node_T12L1_Glyph02.RulesDescription: • Interacting with the Glyph will put afflictions on the Killer based on the level of the Tome the challenge is on.

node_T12L1_Start01.Name: Prologue
node_T12L1_Start01.Description: Select challenges to progress through the Auris Web.

node_T12L1_Start02.Name: Prologue
node_T12L1_Start02.Description: Select challenges to progress through the Auris Web.

node_T12L2_01.Name: Scientific Breakthrough
node_T12L2_01.Description: Break 8 walls or pallets with a Lethal Rush as The Blight.
node_T12L2_01.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L2_02.Name: Action, Reaction
node_T12L2_02.Description: Down 2 Survivor(s) near pallets while using the perk Hex: Blood Favor.
node_T12L2_02.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L2_03.Name: Undying Influence
node_T12L2_03.Description: Finish the trial with at least 1 Hex Totem(s) remaining while using the perk Hex: Undying.
node_T12L2_03.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L2_04.Name: Speedy Demise
node_T12L2_04.Description: Down 2 Survivor(s) with a Lethal Rush as The Blight.
node_T12L2_04.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L2_05.Name: Peer Reviewed
node_T12L2_05.Description: Succeed, or have another Survivor succeed, 5 skill checks while repairing a generator cooperatively while using the perk Corrective Action.
node_T12L2_05.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L2_06.Name: No Stone Unturned
node_T12L2_06.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L2_07.Name: This One's Personal
node_T12L2_07.Description: Kill the Obsession 1 time(s) by any means.
node_T12L2_07.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L2_08.Name: Machinist
node_T12L2_08.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L2_09.Name: Zero to Sixty
node_T12L2_09.Description: Knock down a Survivor within 60 seconds of downing another Survivor 2 time(s).
node_T12L2_09.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L2_11.Name: Sore Ankles
node_T12L2_11.Description: Fall from a great height while being chased 3 time(s).

node_T12L2_15.Name: Callousness or Compassion
node_T12L2_15.Description:
Earn a total of 3 of the following of Silver Quality or better as Survivor or Killer:
  • Benevolent emblem(s).
  • Malicious emblem(s).

node_T12L2_17.Name: Spree of Violence
node_T12L2_17.Description: Hit 8 different Survivor(s) with your weapon.

node_T12L2_End01.Name: Epilogue
node_T12L2_End01.Description: Complete the level and collect your rewards.

node_T12L2_End02.Name: Epilogue
node_T12L2_End02.Description: Complete the level and collect your rewards.

node_T12L2_End03.Name: Epilogue
node_T12L2_End03.Description: Complete the level and collect your rewards.

node_T12L2_Glyph01.Name: Glyph Seeker
node_T12L2_Glyph01.Description: Commune with 3 Red Glyph(s).
node_T12L2_Glyph01.RulesDescription: • Selecting this challenge generates a Red Glyph.

node_T12L2_Glyph02.Name: Glyph Massacre
node_T12L2_Glyph02.Description: Commune with the Orange Glyph and then Hook 6 Survivors.
node_T12L2_Glyph02.RulesDescription: • Interacting with the Glyph will put afflictions on the Killer based on the level of the Tome the challenge is on.

node_T12L2_Glyph03.Name: Glyph Graduate
node_T12L2_Glyph03.Description: Commune with 2 Yellow Glyph(s).
node_T12L2_Glyph03.RulesDescription: • Selecting this challenge generates a Yellow Glyph that will test your focus.

node_T12L2_Start01.Name: Prologue
node_T12L2_Start01.Description: Select challenges to progress through the Auris Web.

node_T12L3_01.Name: Solve For X
node_T12L3_01.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L3_02.Name: Breathless
node_T12L3_02.Description: Down 6 Survivor(s) while using only the perk(s) Stridor and no other perk(s).
node_T12L3_02.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L3_03.Name: Botanist's Blessing
node_T12L3_03.Description: Completely heal 3 health state(s) of any Survivor as Claudette Morel.
node_T12L3_03.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L3_04.Name: Stop 'Em in Their Tracks
node_T12L3_04.Description: Stun or blind the Killer 3 time(s).
node_T12L3_04.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L3_05.Name: Long Distance Runner
node_T12L3_05.Description: Be chased by the Killer for a total of 75 second(s).
node_T12L3_05.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L3_06.Name: You, Yes, You
node_T12L3_06.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L3_07.Name: Leap of Faith
node_T12L3_07.Description: Vault a pallet or window while in a chase 6 time(s).

node_T12L3_09.Name: Take Care
node_T12L3_09.Description: Heal yourself a total of 6 health states.

node_T12L3_10.Name: High Skill
node_T12L3_10.Description: Get a Great result on 8 Skill Check(s).

node_T12L3_15.Name: Exposed Target
node_T12L3_15.Description: Hit 8 Survivor(s) with your weapon while that Survivor is Exposed.

node_T12L3_16.Name: Deadly Pursuit
node_T12L3_16.Description: Chase Survivors for a total of 240 second(s).

node_T12L3_18.Name: Suffer or Slaughter
node_T12L3_18.Description:
Earn a total of 3 of the following of Gold Quality or better as Survivor or Killer:
  • Unbroken emblem(s).
  • Devout emblem(s).

node_T12L3_19.Name: Cleanse the Filth
node_T12L3_19.Description: Hit a Survivor 6 time(s) right after a Blink as The Nurse.
node_T12L3_19.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L3_20.Name: Raised to the Nth Power
node_T12L3_20.Description: Escape 1 trial(s) through the exit gate while using the perk Boon: Exponential.
node_T12L3_20.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L3_End01.Description: Complete the level and collect your rewards.

node_T12L3_End02.Description: Complete the level and collect your rewards.

node_T12L3_Glyph01.Description: Commune with 3 Green Glyph(s).
node_T12L3_Glyph01.RulesDescription: • Selecting this challenge generates multiple Green Glyphs where totems appear and can be interacted with by anyone with this challenge. They will be briefly revealed in the Endgame Collapse.

node_T12L3_Glyph02.Name: Glyph Tracker
node_T12L3_Glyph02.Description: Commune with 3 Purple Glyph(s).
node_T12L3_Glyph02.RulesDescription: • Selecting this challenge generates an invisible Purple Glyph that leaves a trail of ooze as it moves.

node_T12L3_Glyph03.Description: Commune with the Orange Glyph and then Hook 6 Survivors.

node_T12L4_01.Name: Outta Sight
node_T12L4_01.Description: Hide within 10 meters of the Killer without being caught for a total of 120 seconds.

node_T12L4_05.Name: The Engineer's Guild
node_T12L4_05.Description: Repair a total of 8 generator(s) while cooperating with other Survivor(s).

node_T12L4_06.Name: By Hook or Crook
node_T12L4_06.Description: Hook 2 different Survivors within 60 second(s). Do this 4 time(s).

node_T12L4_10.Name: Looking Out For Number One
node_T12L4_10.Description: Finish healing yourself QuestEvent.HealFinishSelf time(s) and escape while using only the perk(s) 1 and no other perk(s).
node_T12L4_10.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L4_12.Name: Repair or Raze
node_T12L4_12.Description:
Earn a total of 3 of the following of Iridescent Quality as Survivor or Killer:
  • Lightbringer emblem(s).
  • Gatekeeper emblem(s).

node_T12L4_13.Name: Patch or Dispatch
node_T12L4_13.Description:
Complete a total of 12 of the following as Survivor or Killer:
  • Succeed at healing skill checks.
  • Down Survivors.

node_T12L4_14.Name: Blink and You're Dead
node_T12L4_14.Description: Hit 2 Survivors with a basic attack within 15 seconds of hitting a Survivor with a Lethal Blink as The Nurse.
node_T12L4_14.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L4_15.Name: Crushing Dominance
node_T12L4_15.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L4_16.Name: Backdoor Exit
node_T12L4_16.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L4_17.Name: Locked In Here With Me
node_T12L4_17.Description: Finish a trial without a single Survivor escaping through the exit gates as The Nurse.
node_T12L4_17.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L4_18.Name: Back Off!
node_T12L4_18.RulesDescription: • Complete this challenge in a single trial.

node_T12L4_End01.Description: Complete the level and collect your rewards.

node_T12L4_End02.Description: Complete the level and collect your rewards.

node_T12L4_Glyph01.Description: Commune with 3 White Glyph(s).
node_T12L4_Glyph01.RulesDescription: • Selecting this challenge generates a fragile White Glyph. Take it to a dangerous place without rushing, falling, or being injured.
